import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-histogram-diagram', templateUrl: './histogram-diagram.component.html', styleUrls: ['./histogram-diagram.component.scss'] }) export class HistogramDiagramComponent { @Input() frequencyNumber: string; @Input() products: Product[]; @Input() displayCode: boolean; }
